name: CreateDeployedDevicesDeployment
description: Create a new Deployment in the Fleet, optionally giving it a friendly name and linking to a specific Twilio Sync service instance.

FriendlyName.description: Provides a human readable descriptive text for this Deployment, up to 256 characters long.

SyncServiceSid.description: Provides the unique string identifier of the Twilio Sync service instance that will be linked to and accessible by this Deployment.

$ul: **account_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Account responsible for this Deployment.
**date_created**: Specifies the date this Deployment was created, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**date_updated**: Specifies the date this Deployment was last updated, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**fleet_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Fleet that the given Deployment belongs to.
**friendly_name**: Contains a human readable descriptive text for this Deployment, up to 64 characters long
**sid**: Contains a 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Deployment resource.
**sync_service_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Twilio Sync service instance linked to and accessible by this Deployment.
**url**: Contains an absolute URL for this Deployment resource.
